seniority_level.evidence: 1-5 years experience required, title is 'Software & Data Engineer' without senior/staff designation, aligns with mid-level IC role

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly includes 'Data Engineer', core responsibilities focus on data pipelines, ontology, and integrations within Palantir Foundry

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on Palantir Foundry (data platform), data pipelines, and ontology objects suggests structured data warehousing and modeling rather than streaming or ML infrastructure

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of managing teams, mentoring, or technical leadership; responsibilities are implementation-focused with collaboration, not direction

primary_cloud.evidence: No cloud providers (AWS, Azure, GCP) mentioned in job posting or Pass 1 extraction; Palantir Foundry can be deployed on-prem or cloud, but no specific cloud is referenced

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud providers mentioned at all in the job posting or extraction

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on data pipelines, integrations, and ontology within Foundry suggests batch-oriented ETL/ELT workflows rather than real-time streaming; no streaming tools (Kafka, Flink, Kinesis) mentioned

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestrators (Airflow, Dagster, dbt, etc.) mentioned; Palantir Foundry has its own workflow engine but not classified under standard categories

storage_layer.evidence: No specific storage systems (S3, Snowflake, Delta Lake, etc.) mentioned; Foundry abstracts storage, so layer is not specified

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Berthoud, CO; work model is onsite; no remote flexibility mentioned

timezone_focus.evidence: US-only requirement with Colorado location; no mention of global or multi-timezone teams

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model in Berthoud, CO; no mention of remote work or flexibility; implies relocation if not already in area

h1b_friendly.evidence: Explicitly requires US citizenship, permanent residency, refugee, or asylum status; no mention of visa sponsorship

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Requires work authorization (citizenship or permanent residency), which excludes OPT/CPT status

citizenship_required.evidence: Explicitly states 'US CITIZENSHIP, PERMANENT RESIDENCY, REFUGEE OR ASYLUM STATUS IS REQUIRED' — citizenship is the highest tier listed and required for security clearance

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time exempt position with benefits (401k, equity, PTO) strongly implies W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: Includes unlimited PTO, equity grants, parental leave, health insurance, 401k, and additional voluntary benefits — exceeds standard package

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'exciting challenges' and 'supportive team' but no specific career tracks, promotion paths, or advancement levels

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions collaboration with Product Owner and other Software & Data Engineers, suggesting peer learning and team-based growth, but no formal mentorship program

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression in the job posting

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or lateral moves

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, architect, specialist) mentioned or implied

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-haves (Palantir Foundry, data pipelines, agile) vs. nice-to-haves (manufacturing/IoT systems); 1-5 years experience is a moderate range

scope_definition.evidence: Focused role within Palantir Foundry: data pipelines, ontology, integrations, dashboards — well-defined responsibilities without hybrid roles

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements (1-5 years, Palantir Foundry, data pipelines) are reasonable for a mid-level data engineer role; no unrealistic skill combinations
